title: Predictive value of serum homocysteine and potassium ion for short-term prognosis of patients with acute cerebral infarction following intravenous thrombolysis with recombinant tissue plasminogen activator.

Serum levels of HcY and electrolytes were detected. The 90-day prognosis of patients after thrombolysis was analyzed.
